Functions
derive_seed

Makes any length of data compatible with PIPE. The purpose of this function is part compatibility and flexibility (allowing anyone to use any source of data as a seed), and security (by hashing the seed we get rid of any potential bits leaking important information).

Parameters
seed

An array of bytes of any length

Returns

A static length array to use across the protocol.

Example
// Can be BIP 39 Mnemonic, a keyfile, etc. As long as it's origin is secure and the user is made aware it's private info!
let seed = "r4uujahLuOtzxLn4TTwwwtF3eDmftGdQ".as_bytes();
let seed = derive_seed(&seed);
